name: Boating - Recreational boating activities - pressure layer from the WIO Symphony tool
description: AIS data 2020-2022 supplied by HUB Ocean where used to map time (hours/week) spent by passenger boats within each 1km pixel. Known limitations: Vessel activities from smaller boats, and other water crafts which are not using AIS systems are not included in this dataset
